title: Do you participate in any charity?
description:
Watch The Full Thing Here : 
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "You have really taken your system for building great social circle and adapted it into a charitable angle. I love this. One of these things where I started getting involved with these influencer charities, so we would invite girls with large social media followings and we get them to use their platforms in order to get more people to come and donate either money or toys, give us a toy drive, or we did an animal rescue supplies for animals. And it got to the point where we did so many of them, and I'm referring to Babes in Toyland, the Teatro Parties, the Model Citizen Fund, which is Dan Fleischman's event, Paradise Challenge in Jamaica. They help raise money for a school that's out there. Let's just say you met like a Lindsay Payless or an Emily Sears or something like that. For them to help promote a charity is very easy for them because they have a lot of eyeballs that are on the show. Emily Myers, CJ Sparks, someone like that, and they can help that charity very easily with very little work. They have what I would consider a superpower. We came to the idea of let's have these ladies use their superpower. I think we should bring awareness to these things and having a large social media following allows you to.
